scripts.prod: rm -Rf public/stylesheets/fontawesome && mkdir -p public/stylesheets/fontawesome/scss && mkdir -p public/stylesheets/fontawesome/webfonts && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/scss public/stylesheets/fontawesome && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts public/stylesheets/fontawesome && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js public/javascripts/jquery.min.js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js public/javascripts/bootstrap.min.js && cp node_modules/popper.js/dist/popper.min.js public/javascripts/popper.min.js
